MWTools 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Reference

    All functions

    add_concordance_codes()

    Add 3 letter ISO codes and MWTools-specific region codes

    add_hmw_analysis_sectors()

    Map ILO broad sectors HMW analysis sector categories

    add_hmw_region_codes()

    Add the regional codes used on analysis of human muscle work.

    add_row_col_meta()

    Prep PFU data for conversion to PSUT matrices

    all_stages

    All energy stages

    amw_analysis_constants

    Animal muscle work (amw) analysis data constants

    amw_analysis_data_path()

    Gives a file path to the animal muscle work analysis excel workbook

    amw_test_data_path()

    Gives a file path to the FAO animal muscle work test data

    calc_amw_pfu()

    Calculate primary, final, and useful working animal energy

    calc_final_energy()

    Calculate the final energy metabolised by working animals

    calc_hmw_final_energy()

    Calculate the final energy consumed by human workers

    calc_hmw_pfu()

    Calculate primary, final, and useful human muscle work.

    calc_hmw_primary_energy()

    Calculate the primary energy consumed by human workers

    calc_hmw_useful_energy()

    Calculate the useful energy produced by human workers

    calc_primary_energy()

    Calculate the primary energy embodied in the feed supplied to working animals

    calc_sector_split()

    Calculate the number of working animals in agriculture and transport

    calc_total_hours_worked()

    Calculate the total number of hours worked each year

    calc_useful_energy()

    Calculate the useful energy produced by working animals performing muscle work

    calc_working_animals()

    Calculate the number of working animals

    calc_yearly_feed()

    Calculate the yearly feed requirements of working animals by species

    conc_cols

    Country concordance columns

    energy_types

    Energy types in muscle work data frames

    fao_codes

    FAO data item code names

    fao_cols

    FAO data column names

    fao_concordance_path()

    Gives a file path to the concordance data excel workbook

    fill_ilo_data()

    Fill missing data for the number of hours worked and employed persons based on the earliest value

    get_broad.sector_data()

    Retrieve data with sectors organised by "Broad sector"

    get_working_species()

    Create a data frame containing the total number of animals of working species

    hmw_analysis_constants

    Human muscle work (hmw) analysis data constants

    hmw_analysis_data_path()

    Gives a file path to the human muscle work analysis excel workbook

    hmw_test_data_path()

    Gives a file path to the ILO human muscle work test data

    ilo_codes

    ILO data item code names

    ilo_cols

    ILO data column names

    mw_cols

    Column names in muscle work data frames

    mw_constants

    General MWTools constants

    mw_products

    Muscle work products

    mw_sectors

    Economic sectors for muscle work

    mw_species

    Working animal species

    prep_psut()

    Convert a tidy data frame to PSUT matrices

    specify_energy_type_method()

    Add energy type and method columns to tidy muscle work data frames

    specify_fu_machines()

    Specify final-to-useful industries

    specify_ktoe()

    Converts units from EJ to ktoe

    specify_last_stages()

    Create energy conversion chains for final and useful last stages

    specify_primary_production()

    Add primary production to a data frame of PFU muscle work data

    specify_product()

    Add a product column to a muscle work data frame

    specify_useful_products()

    Specify useful energy products

    tidy_fao_live_animals()

    Tidy live animals data from the FAO

    tidy_hmw_pfu()

    Produce a tidy human muscle work data frame

    tidy_pfu_data()

    Tidy a data frame containg primary, final, and useful energy data for working animals

    trim_fao_data()

    Trim countries in FAO live animals data

    unit_constants

    Unit constants
